1: The Lord reigns. He is clothed in majesty. The Lord is clothed—he wears strength like a belt. Yes, the world stands firm. It will not be moved.
2: Your throne was established long ago. You are from eternity.
3: The waves[a] have lifted up, O Lord, the waves have lifted up their voice. The waves roar loudly.
4: Mightier than the thundering of the great waters, mightier than the breakers of the sea, the Lord on high is mighty.
5: Your testimonies stand very firm. Holiness beautifies your house for endless days, O Lord.
